txt.en: 'It is as I feared... Ferndúr has escaped, [placeholder]. Let us return to Rivendell.'
Instance: Laying to Rest the Evil Dead
DNT -- Will not be seen

'The time has come, [placeholder]. If this Gaunt-lord's fell powers are truly the cause of the evil in the Trollshaws, he must be dealt with.

'We cannot allow him to muster any more of the dead and bolster his strength.

'Ready yourself, [placeholder]. None shall keep us from this task!'
You should speak with Glorfindel before proceeding against the enemy.\n\nGlorfindel is standing outside Ost Brandras and waiting for your aid in confronting Ferndúr the Virulent.
Frodo is on the paths outside the Last Homely House, taking in the night air.\n\nGandalf the Grey asked you to walk with Frodo Baggins and to gauge his state-of-mind.
Frodo is on the paths outside the Last Homely House, taking in the night air.\n\nGandalf the Grey asked you to walk with Frodo Baggins and to gauge his state-of-mind.
Frodo is on the paths outside the Last Homely House, taking in the night air.\n\nGandalf the Grey asked you to walk with Frodo Baggins and to gauge his state-of-mind.
Frodo is standing at a crossing of paths not far from the Last Homely House.\n\nYour walk with Frodo seems to have soothed some of his anxieties.

'Our foe expects us, [placeholder]... this much is clear.

'Ferndúr's vile influence has claimed too many of my people and sickened our lands. His disease must be purged from the Trollshaws.

'I see only his foul servants here, but the Gaunt-lord must be nearby. Let us advance with care....'
<rgb=#FF0000>Glorfindel has been defeated!</rgb>
Glorfindel is at Ost Brandras.\n\nYou should follow Glorfindel into the ruins and confront Ferndúr the Virulent.
The gaunt-men can be found atop the altar in Ost Brandras.\n\nYou have reached the base of the altar, and should now confront the gaunt-men.
Glorfindel is at Ost Brandras.\n\nYou should follow Glorfindel into the ruins and confront Ferndúr the Virulent.
Talk to Glorfindel
Ferndúr the Virulent can be found atop the altar in Ost Brandras.\n\nYou have confronted Ferndúr and should now defeat him.
Walk with Frodo
Walk with Frodo
Glorfindel is standing at the base of the altar in Ost Brandras.\n\nYou have fought your way through many fell spirits and should now confront Ferndúr when you are able.
Approach the gaunt-men atop the altar
Walk with Frodo
Walk with Frodo
Walk with Frodo
Defeat Ferndúr the Virulent and his gaunt-men
Walk with Frodo
Talk to Frodo
<rgb=#FF0000>Glorfindel must not be defeated</rgb>
Talk to Glorfindel
You have accompanied Lord Glorfindel to Ost Brandras to confront the Gaunt-lord, Ferndúr the Virulent.
Follow Glorfindel into Ost Brandras
Fight your way to the altar with Glorfindel
DNT -- Will not be seen

'I've always said that a nice walk in the night air will do wonders to clear one's head, and it seems that I was right -- I feel much better now, [placeholder].

'I enjoyed our conversation. If I see you again, we'll have to have another.

'When I see you again, I mean.'
